name: Secret Flirts: Make Everyone Fall For You!
overview: Become irresitible and win the heart of the boy of your dreams! - Create and develop your character: choose your looks, haircut, body shape, even your witty chat, and catch the eye of all the boys. - Go shopping, find a part-time job, go to college... manage your time and money so you can buy yourself clothes, make-up and accessories! - Have a blast with the mini games including "Hold his Hand" and "Help Cupid"... - Follow the advice of the "Love Coach" and make everyone fall for you in the game... and maybe also in real life! - Chat with your friends and admirers using "Love Messenger" with the Nintendo DS Wireless Communications!
